snippet.title: Capcom Vs. SNK 2 EO playthrough (Xbox)
snippet.description:
60fps available!

Playthrough with Ken, Terry and Haohmaru. The Xbox version of Capcom Vs. SNK 2 was released in 2003. It has a control scheme referred to as "Easy Operation", which lets you use the right thumbstick to do special and super moves. This extra control scheme was also in the Gamecube version.

The roll cancel glitch was also removed. This glitch was in the arcade, Dreamcast and I believe  Playstation 2 versions. The glitch let you cancel a roll into a special move. Look it up on SRK if you want more info about that glitch.

Finally this version had an online mode. And whilst I only ever got to play a few games on it, it was terrible, with lots of lag to the point where it was unplayable. There have been a lot of calls to get this game onto current gen consoles, but that's yet to happen.

The roll cancel glitch was also removed. This glitch was in the arcade, Dreamcast and I believe  Playstation 2 versions. The glitch let you cancel a roll into a special move. Look it up on SRK if you want more info about that glitch.

Finally this version had an online mode. And whilst I only ever got to play a few games on it, it was terrible, with lots of lag to the point where it was unplayable. There have been a lot of calls to get this game onto current gen consoles, but that's yet to happen.
